alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Garfield; Holt; Loup; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 11:26PM CDT until June 30 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rock County in north central Nebraska... Northern Loup County in north central Nebraska... Southeastern Brown County in north central Nebraska... Western Garfield County in north central Nebraska... Southwestern Holt County in north central Nebraska... Northeastern Blaine County in north central Nebraska... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1124 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ainsworth to 8 miles east of Brewster, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bassett, Atkinson, Stuart, Long Pine, Newport, Rose, Amelia, Calamus Reservoir, Hofeld Lake, Fox Bayou, Raven, Almeria Meadow, Twin Lakes, Carson Lake, Duff, Sunfish Lake, Homestead Knolls Campground, Nunda Shoal Campground and Hannamon Bayou Campground. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 132 and 196. Highway 20 between mile markers 234 and 294. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Brown; Garfield; Holt; Loup; Rock
